ValidationRule.description: Check if the Account Name has been updated before saving. Account Name is mastered and should not be updated. -TKT-000351 : amended rule to allow pnet (Partner Connection User) for SF2SF sync from CRM4U
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISCHANGED( Name ) && $User.Alias != 'pnet' && $Profile.Name != 'Reltio Integration' && $Profile.Name != 'CDW Data Import' && RecordType.DeveloperName = 'HCO_RFMC'
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please forward change requests to RFM Systems Admin.
